content: if you re looking for a quick and easy crochet frog pattern you ve just hopped into the right place this free leggy frog crochet pattern is perfect for beginners and experienced crocheters alike **materials** ▢red heart yarn - aran ▢red heart yarn - light thyme ▢4 5 mm hook ▢polyfill ▢8 mm safety eyes ▢tapestry needle **abbreviations us terms ** magic_ring - magic_ring chain - chain single_crochet - single_crochet slip_stitch - slip_stitch increase - increase decrease - decrease back loop only - blo
